    • seatprice

      public static double seatprice(String seat, String seatpxss, int answer, String plan)
      Description: it calculates the price of the seat, in case the user chose it.
      Parameters:
      String - seat, it has to be hall, window or middle.
      String - seatpxss, in this case when the user that chose the xs or s plan decided to add choosing the seat.
      int - answer, it has to be an int number: 1 or 0.
      String - plan, it is a string: xs, s or m.
      Returns:
      double price.
